title: Brainvire Infotech - Business Analyst - Odoo
description:
Analyst - Odoo ERP.

Job Description

Key Responsibilities :


Conduct thorough analysis of customer business needs, workflows, and existing systems.
Gather detailed requirements from clients through meetings, workshops, and presentations.
Document and prioritize customer requirements effectively.
Identify and analyze business processes and suggest improvements.
Map customer requirements to the appropriate Odoo modules and functionalities.
Design and configure Odoo solutions to meet specific client needs. Develop and maintain detailed system documentation.
Participate in project planning and execution, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to project timelines.
Collaborate with the implementation team to ensure smooth project execution.
Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) with clients.
Provide post-implementation support and training to clients.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients.
Act as a trusted advisor to clients on ERP best practices and Odoo solutions.
Effectively communicate technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences.
Prepare and present proposals and presentations to clients.
Keep abreast of the latest developments in Odoo ERP and industry best practices. Continuously improve your knowledge and skills through training and certifications.


Required Skills & Experience


3+ years of experience in ERP implementation and support, with a strong preference for Odoo ERP.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Strong understanding of business processes and workflows.
Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong project management and organizational skills.
Ability to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Proficiency in MS Office Suite.


Preferred Skills


Experience in specific industry verticals (e.g., manufacturing, retail, healthcare).
Experience with Agile methodologies. Odoo certifications.
